TopicTitle: Uhg just looked at the minecraft forums.

Articles.Content: I have an account on the MC forums, went on there for the first time in like a month, went to the PC section... My eyes hurt.

There there, its not that bad.

At least your back...
You aren\'t alone my friend, and I know for a fact SteevyT is on there pretty actively...
I\'ve been looking at MCF every now and then. It\'s not *that* bad, as long as you stick to Redstone and Survival Discussion.

I used to be an active off topicer.

Now I\'m on once a month if that.
Ahahahahaha. Well, that\'s why I rarely venture beyond my own topic. I\'m sure appleslinky misses me; he always seems pleasantly surprised whenever I visit the texture artists\' union thread...

Why would you do such a thing? While I play MC, I stay far from the official forums - the more users there are on a forum, the more immature people and trolls there are, and there\'s no way that even good moderators can handle the MCF.
It\'s worse than the Roblox forums... And they\'re bad.

It\'s worse than the Roblox forums... And they\'re bad.

Don\'t even get me started on the roblox forums.

I think I\'ll just stick to these forums, I\'ll only go on the MC ones for mods.

I think I\'ll just stick to these forums, I\'ll only go on the MC ones for mods.

I won\'t go looking for mods there either - most links are adfly, which I entirely distrust.

I won\'t go looking for mods there either - most links are adfly, which I entirely distrust.

I have a chrome adfly blocker.
